refreshService

public void refreshService(String serviceName,
                           String oldServiceName,
                           String serviceType,
                           String output_dir,
                           String output_url,
                           String image_format,
                           String config)
                    throws javax.ejb.CreateException,
                           javax.ejb.RemoveException,
                           javax.ejb.FinderException,
                           RemoteException
Refresh a service. If the new name equals the original name, it will just update other fields.Otherwise, it will remove the old one and re-create the new one.

Parameters:
serviceName - the new service name
oldServiceName - the oroginal service name
serviceType - the service type
output_dir - output directory
output_url - output URL
image_format - output image format
config - the service configuration
Throws:
javax.ejb.CreateException
javax.ejb.RemoveException
javax.ejb.FinderException
RemoteException
